name: Edifice
description:
Cletus was never particularly fond of his friends, but in this brief survival-horror adventure he must begrudgingly explore the erratic mansion they decided to visit. Armed with his stainless steel 'Streamlight 74751' and  his trust 1911, Cletus Nails will make sort work of anything lurking in the ominous twilight.

Features:

-Story elements

-Eerie atmosphere

-Satisfying top down shooting

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Toggle Torch

R - Reload
